attributes.description:
Motordeal Prestige
Dealers in quality pre-owned cars. Trade-ins welcome, finance available through all the major banks, Please note prices exclude admin, documentation, delivery and licensing costs. Deliveries nationwide. Refer someone and get paid a minimum of R 2000-R5000 for any successful referrals  The difference is in the quality. Call us now. Sell us your pre loved car before trading it in or outright sale, we will either meet or better any written quote.T&Cs apply.

attributes.description: Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why AGG Westrand offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through AGG Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today
